analysis.description:
RankingBallGoldCrowdsale.initialized (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol) shadows:
	- HolderBase.initialized (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#125-127)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1374-1376) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1469-1503)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1584-1609)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1703-1719)

BlockIntervalCrowdsale.recentBlock (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#999-1002) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- validPurchase (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1009-1016)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1783-1797) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1518-1539):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1531-1537)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1537-1538)

Reentrancy in BaseCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#838-841):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#841)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#841)
releaseRatio in Locker.getVariableReleasableAmount (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#577) is a local variable never initialiazed

Locker.release (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#489-514) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,releasableAmount) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#513)

BaseCrowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#968-975) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#974-975)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1814-1827) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1823-1825)

MiniMeBaseCrowdsale.generateTokens (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1952-1958) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.generateTokens(_beneficiary,_tokens) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1955-1958)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1750) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1798-1800)

Reentrancy in Locker.activate (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#388-406):
	External calls:
	- initialBalance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#397-400)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- activeTime (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#400-401)
	- state (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#406)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1783-1797)
	- /unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1788-1797

MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol#1345-1347)
RankingBallGoldCrowdsale.initialized should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0xd3c61abce3053355a4f882635eb82dd60400cb2c.sol)
